connect.label.showCubes.translation: Put {0} cubes in front of Cozmo.

minigame.quitView.description.translation: Any progress in this game will be lost. Are you sure?

minigame.label.showCubes.singular.translation: Put {0} cube in front of Cozmo. It will turn white when he can see it.

minigame.label.showCubes.plural.translation: Put {0} cubes in front of Cozmo. They'll turn white when he can see them.

minigame.label.cozmoPrep.translation: Cozmo is getting ready to play...

playhouseGame01.text.howToPlay.translation: Select animations together to create a play for Cozmo

simonGame.howToPlay.translation: Listen and watch the pattern for each round.  When it’s your turn, tap the Cubes in order to repeat the pattern.  One mistake, and it’s game over!

simonGame.label.yourTurnListen.translation: Your turn to listen to the pattern...

simonGame.label.yourTurnRepeat.translation: Your turn to repeat to the pattern!

simonGame.label.cozmoTurnListen.translation: Cozmo's turn to listen to the pattern...

simonGame.label.cozmoTurnRepeat.translation: Cozmo's turn to repeat to the pattern!

simonGame.text.howToPlay.translation: Take turns with Cozmo to make patterns. When Cozmo makes a pattern, watch closely and  try to copy him by tapping the cubes in the same order. When It's your turn, tap the cubes to make a pattern for Cozmo to copy! The game ends when someone messes up. Try for a high score!

simonGame.label.placeCenter.translation:
Put 1 cube in front of Cozmo, and two others on either side.

Leave space in-between.

speedTap.tapBlock.translation:
Tap a flashing cube
to play with!

Cubes should be separated.

speedTap.tapBlockForRound.translation: Tap your cube to begin the next round.

minigame.dontMoveCozmo.description.translation: Cozmo has moved and can't continue the game.

speedTap.dontMoveBlock.description.translation: Cozmo can't find his cube! He can't keep playing.

codeBreaker.text.howToPlayShort.translation:
Tap Cube: Change color.
        'Guess Code' will be green when the cubes are lined up.

        BACKPACK LIGHTS: 
        Green = A Cube is the correct color AND Position
        Blue = A Cube is in the correct color, but the WRONG Position
        Red = A Cube is in the WRONG color AND the WRONG Position

codeBreaker.text.howToPlayLong.translation:
Guess Cozmo's Code before you run out of guesses!
        The Code is a number of cubes of different colors, arranged horizontally in a line in front of Cozmo.
        1. Cozmo will pick a code.
        2. Tap a Cube to change the Cube's color.
        3. Arrange the cubes in a line in front of Cozmo.
        4. Tap 'Guess Code' when you're ready to guess.
        5. Cozmo will display lights on his back to let you know correctness:
        Green = A Cube is the correct color AND Position
        Blue = A Cube is in the correct color, but the WRONG Position
        Red = A Cube is in the WRONG color AND the WRONG Position

cubeSlap.text.howToPlay.translation: Cozmo will try to slap the cube after it turns green! Pull the cube away just as Cozmo trys to slap it. Be careful, if you move it too early you'll lose a life.

cubePounce.info.cozmoWinEarly.translation: Cozmo wins! You moved the Cube too early!

cubePounce.info.playerWinPoint.translation: You Win! You were too fast for Cozmo!

cubePounce.info.waitForPounce.translation: Wait for Cozmo to pounce, then yank the cube away before they slap it!

cubePounce.info.cozmoWinPoint.translation: Cozmo wins! They slapped the Cube!

cubePounce.info.setupText.translation: Place a cube in front of Cozmo, hold it still when it turns green.

speedTap.difficulty.easyDescription.translation:
Be the first to slap your cube when the colors match
- but never slap on red!

speedTap.difficulty.mediumDescription.translation: Same rules as Easy mode, but now with light patterns! Cubes may have up to 2 colors.

speedTap.difficulty.hardDescription.translation:
More complexity!
Cubes may have 1-3 colors.

speedTap.difficulty.expertDescription.translation:
Experts only:
Cubes may have 1-4 colors.

speedTap.difficulty.mediumDescription.lo.translation: Unlock by winning Speed Tap Easy.

speedTap.difficulty.hardDescription.lock.translation: Unlock by winning Speed Tap Medium.

speedTap.difficulty.expertDescription.lo.translation: Unlock by winning Speed Tap Hard.

pressDemoSpeedTap.difficulty.hardDescrip.translation: Cozmo is better at Speed Tap.
Unlock by playing Speed Tap once.
